headline: Drones And Tougher Fireworks Enforcement Usher In The New Year
summary: The Big Island fireworks smuggling case may involve immigration enforcement authorities, as federal agencies responsible for border security and customs enforcement often handle both goods smuggling and immigration-related violations under coordinated anti-smuggling policies.

headline: Shutdowns, shakeups, budget fights, chromite: Looking back on 2025 through our camera lens
summary: Maryland lawmakers closed a more than $3 billion budget gap through program cuts and tax increases, but face another $1 billion-plus budget hole projected for 2026; with tax increases likely off the table in the election year, the state confronts significant ongoing fiscal challenges.

headline: Trump says heâ€™s dropping push for National Guard in Chicago, LA and Portland, Oregon, for now
summary: A Trump press conference at Mar-a-Lago could generate Texas protests if policy statements or political rhetoric mobilize demonstrators on state or national issues.

outlet: News From The States - Fair. Fearless. Free.
headline: Trump gives up on National Guard deployment in 3 cities
summary: Following massive protests against immigration raids in Los Angeles earlier this summer, President Trump deployed National Guard troops to that city and others, but is now withdrawing plans for Chicago, Los Angeles, and Portland after the Supreme Court and federal courts ruled such deployments unlawful. Courts have blocked extended military presence in cities after protests quelled, though Guard members remain deployed in Washington D.C., Memphis, and New Orleans.
